title: Flaky test: Microsoft.Build.UnitTests.BackEnd.TaskBuilder_Tests.TasksCanAddRecursiveDirBuiltInMetadata
body:
`TasksCanAddRecursiveDirBuiltInMetadata` failed for me but passed under debugger:
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/13522d2466ae1634177e2a6a40fefaedff95139c/src/Build.UnitTests/BackEnd/TaskBuilder_Tests.cs#L355
